identity.name: FinControl Pro
identity.mission: To provide professional-grade financial clarity in a personal package.

headings.usage: Use for all page titles, section headers, and card titles. Letter spacing: tracking-tight (-0.02em).

body.usage: Use for all paragraph text, inputs, and data tables. Relaxed leading.

mono.usage: Use for financial figures in tables or sensitive data display.

buttons.primary: bg-[#7F5AF0] text-white hover:bg-[#6244C5] rounded-lg font-medium px-6 py-3 transition-all shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(127,90,240,0.3)] hover:shadow-[0_0_25px_rgba(127,90,240,0.5)]
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-[#7F5AF0] text-[#7F5AF0] hover:bg-[#7F5AF0]/10 rounded-lg font-medium px-6 py-3 transition-all
buttons.ghost: text-[#94A1B2] hover:text-white hover:bg-white/5 rounded-lg px-4 py-2 transition-all

cards.style: bg-[#16161A] border border-white/5 rounded-xl shadow-xl backdrop-blur-sm

inputs.style: bg-[#242629] border-white/10 text-white focus:border-[#7F5AF0] focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#7F5AF0] rounded-lg h-12

charts.style: Use transparent backgrounds. Grid lines: stroke='#94A1B2' strokeOpacity={0.1}. Tooltip: contentStyle={{backgroundColor: '#16161A', borderColor: '#2CB67D'}}

hero_background.usage: Hero section background with heavy dark overlay (opacity 80-90%)

investment_concept.usage: Investment tips card or section background

instructions_to_main_agent: Install 'lucide-react' for icons if not present.
Use 'framer-motion' for simple entrance animations if possible, otherwise CSS transitions.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast against the dark background.
For the Landing Page: Focus on the value proposition (R$ 37,90/month) and visual appeal.
For the Dashboard: Prioritize data legibility. Use the Bento Grid layout defined in layout.bento_grid.
For Export: Implement a button that triggers a CSV/Excel download (mock function is fine for UI).
Auth Pages: Keep them clean, centered box on a dark, subtle animated background.
THEME: FORCE DARK MODE. Do not implement a light mode toggle unless necessary for accessibility, but default to DARK.
Use standard HTML <input type='date'> for date pickers if Shadcn calendar is too complex to integrate quickly, but style it to match the dark theme.
Data-Test-ID: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text unless it's a very large headline.
Buttons should have a subtle glow on hover.
Cards must have a 1px border that is slightly lighter than the background to define edges.
Use generous padding (p-6, p-8) inside cards.
